name: Camp Orbit Wire Express KS Quickdraw (6 pack)
categories: Orbit Wire Express KS Quickdraw (6 pack)
description: Start a quickdraw rack or add to your quiver, these wire-gate draws have a carabiner retention system on the dogbone to keep the rope-end carabiner from shifting or twisting. Fat polyester dogbone is tough and comfortable to grab when projecting.Karstop Evo polyurethane retainer prevents the rope-end carabiner from shifting.Orbit Wire carabiners on each end are great for all styles of climbing.Durable 16mm polyester dogbone is comfortable to hold.Comes with 6 quickdraws.
